$comment: Represents the base schema that is common for both props and groups

default.$comment: Untyped default (description common for all types), type to be filled in by prop-typed schema
default.description: The default fallback value for the property, when not defined explicitly by any ruleset

default_from_server_property.description: When the realm property is not defined, fetches this server property key as a default
